comment.body: My upload glitched and I can't delete it.  :(

Thanks nofish!
I think it should refuse the upload if limit is reached, with a message like "maximum file size limit reached".
Also, a current size usage/max usage indicator next to the upload button would be nice.

Thank you for the new stuff by the way, I love the zite!  ^.^
EDIT: also, a tab for "my uploads" would be useful, in case you need to delete something to make room for a new one.
EDIT2: I discovered a glitch, if you upload a file with multiple periods in the file name, it messes up.
